name: Acronym
description:
Acronym game is a fun and engaging word game where players take turns creating a phrase or sentence from a series of letters, with each letter representing a word in the phrase.
And now it's available on your discord
Enjoy!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the cog, run `

load acronym` to load it.
author: sravan
